mapper.select:
SELECT role_logout.id, role_logout.user_id userId, role_logout.role_id roleId, role_logout.role_name roleName, role_logout.level, role_logout.login_time loginTime, role_logout.logout_time logoutTime, role_logout.pid platformId, role_logout.server_id serverId, role_logout.log_time logTime, role_logout.ip, role_logout.province, role_logout.city, role_logout.area, role_logout.log_month, role_logout.log_day, role_logout.log_hour FROM `role_logout` WHERE 1 = 1 and user_id = #{userId} and role_id = #{roleId} and role_name = #{roleName} and log_time <= unix_timestamp(DATE_ADD(#{createDateEnd},INTERVAL 1 day))*1000
and log_time >= unix_timestamp(#{createDateStart})*1000

SELECT pid, count(distinct role_id) au FROM `role_logout` WHERE 1 = 1
AND pid IN
#{item}
and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') GROUP BY pid

SELECT count(distinct role_id) sum_au FROM `role_logout` WHERE 1 = 1
AND pid IN
#{item}
and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','')
SELECT pid, count(distinct role_id) au FROM `role_logout` WHERE pid = #{pid} and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','')

SELECT count(distinct role_id) sum_old_au FROM `role_logout` WHERE 1 = 1
AND pid IN
#{item}
and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','')
and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') and reg_day < replace(#{createDateStart},'-','')

SELECT pid, count(distinct role_id) old_au FROM `role_logout` WHERE pid = #{pid} and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','')
and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') and reg_day < replace(#{createDateStart},'-','')
